Welcome to TailwindWP

This demo shows TailwindCSS classes working directly in WordPress. No CDN, no build step - all CSS is generated server-side by TailwindPHP. Try editing the Tailwind Classes in the sidebar!

'&action=edit')); exit; }); add_action('enqueue_block_editor_assets', function() { global $post; if (!$post || !function_exists('tailwindwp_generate_css')) return; $blocks = parse_blocks($post->post_content); $classes = []; $extract = function($blocks) use (&$extract, &$classes) { foreach ($blocks as $block) { if (!empty($block['attrs']['tailwindClasses'])) { $classes = array_merge($classes, explode(' ', $block['attrs']['tailwindClasses'])); } if (!empty($block['innerBlocks'])) $extract($block['innerBlocks']); } }; $extract($blocks); if (empty($classes)) return; $css = tailwindwp_generate_css(array_unique($classes), ['scope' => '.editor-styles-wrapper']); wp_register_style('tailwindwp-preload', false); wp_enqueue_style('tailwindwp-preload'); wp_add_inline_style('tailwindwp-preload', $css); });
